Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lawrence/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: Eastbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Veterans, Lipps and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Veterans, Lipps, Lawrence and over regular route, due to street blockage near Lawrence/Milwaukee.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at LaSalle/Van Buren
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake and Clark/Lake).

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
